job-app.description:
Requirements
3+ years of experience in software development
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model
Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles
Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)
Familiarity with newer specifications of EcmaScript
Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js)
Knowledge of isomorphic React is a plus
Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools
Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
A knack for benchmarking and optimization
Experience with system architecture or leading a software team is a strong advantage
Full-time availability is a strong advantage

job-app.description:
Responsibilities

Act as the front end development lead, independently work close with members of the demo environment team to deliver a streamlined user experience
Write cutting-edge frontend code using JS/HTML/CSS within client-side MVC frameworks
Work with demonstration program manager to offer guidance and technical feasibility of internal customer requests

Requirements

Experience with JavaScript and ReactJS
Experience working and scripting within multiple operating systems, particularly Linux and Windows
Experience with cyber security
Excellent problem-solving skills with great attention to detail
Preferred
Experience developing software for enterprise
Experience with systems interoperability, integration and networking
Knowledge of data structures, storage systems, cloud infrastructure, front-end frameworks, and other technical tools

Education

Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or related discipline or equivalent work experience,

Responsibilities 

Work with development teams and product managers to conceptualize software solutions 
Design and implement appealing user interfaces 
Design and implement REST and WebSocket APIs 
Design and manage databases 
Write automated tests and perform manual testing 
Troubleshoot and debug issues 
Write technical documentation 
 

Skills and Qualifications  

5+ years experience developing web applications using React 
5+ years experience designing and developing REST APIs using Node.js and Express.js 
Experience with data modeling and both SQL and NoSQL database systems 
Experience working with Git and GitHub 
Outstanding communication skills 
Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience 
Docker 
AWS 
OpenID Connect 
Bash 
Competencies & KSA 

Excellent Communications Proficiency 
Deep functional experience in solution development engagements 
Great team player thinking with the ability to work in small, high functioning teams
job-app.notes: Very close to where I live in Herndon VA.
